project_top_description: When i was in internship at the Baltazare agency, i had to do few creations for the SpeakUp Africa compagny. Golden Sludge is one of their new alliance.
project_slogan: Increase awareness Sanitation in West African countries.
project_main_text:
The Golden Sludge Alliance aims to celebrate successes, influence policies and practices, consolidate knowledge, use and showcase innovative approaches for sustainable sanitation in Africa.

They wanted a website in the spirit of their other website, like Speak-Up Africa. This landing page include all the differents informations about the association.
